subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Scott Baker came within three outs of a perfect game and two outs of a no-hitter last night, falling short of history but leading the host Minnesota Twins over the Kansas City Royals, 5-0, in the second game of a doubleheader.
snippet: Scott Baker came within three outs of a perfect game and two outs of a no-hitter last night, falling short of history but leading the host Minnesota Twins over the Kansas City Royals, 5-0, in the second game of a doubleheader.
